pe3:2.1.pli: Lobhādhiṭṭhānaṃ dosādhiṭṭhānaṃ mohādhiṭṭhānaṃ alobhādhiṭṭhānaṃ adosādhiṭṭhānaṃ amohādhiṭṭhānaṃ kāyakammādhiṭṭhānaṃ vācākammādhiṭṭhānaṃ manokammādhiṭṭhānaṃ saddhindriyādhiṭṭhānaṃ vīriyindriyādhiṭṭhānaṃ satindriyādhiṭṭhānaṃ samādhindriyādhiṭṭhānaṃ paññindriyādhiṭṭhānaṃ.

pe3:5.4.pli: Esa gāḷhaṃ karoti bandhananti rāgaṃ, iti yo yo dhammo mūlanikkhitto, so yevettha dhammo uggāvahitabbo.

pe3:5.5.pli: Na bhagavā ekaṃ dhammaṃ ārabbha aññaṃ dhammaṃ deseti.

pe3:5.6.pli: Yassa vitakketi kāmavitakko tameva vitakkaṃ kāmavitakkena niddisīyati.

pe3:5.8.pli: Subhānupassino bhiyyo taṇhā pavaḍḍhatīti tameva rāgaṃ kāmataṇhāti niddisati.

pe3:5.9.pli: Esa gāḷhaṃ karoti bandhananti tameva taṇhāsaṃyojanaṃ niddisati.

pe3:6.1.pli: Tattha bhagavā ekaṃ dhammaṃ tividhaṃ niddisati, nissandato hetuto phalato.

pe3:8.1.pli: Dadanti yaṃ yaṃ dānaṃ, idaṃ dānamayikaṃ puññakriyaṃ.

pe3:8.4.pli: Bhajanti naṃ bahū, kittinti yo ca kalyāṇo kittisaddo loke abbhuggacchati, yaṃ bahukassa janassa piyo bhavati manāpo ca.

pe3:8.5.pli: Yañca avippaṭisārī kālaṃ karoti ayaṃ nissando.

pe3:8.6.pli: Yaṃ kāyassa bhedā devesu upapajjatīti idaṃ phalaṃ.

pe3:12.3.pli: Surāmerayapānañca, yo naro anuyuñjatīti doso nidānaṃ.

pe3:12.4.pli: Yo ca surāmerayapānaṃ anuyuñjati yathāparadāravihārī amittā janayanti.

pe3:13.1.pli: Pañca verāni appahāyāti pañcannaṃ bhikkhāpadānaṃ samatikkamanaṃ sabbesaṃ dosajānaṃ sā paṇṇatti, teneva dosajanitena kammena dussīlo iti vuccati sopi dhammo hetunā niddisitabbo, nissandena phalena ca.

pe3:14.2.pli: dubbhāsitabhāsī ca hoti, duccintitacintī ca dukkaṭakammakārī ca.

pe3:14.3.pli: Tattha yaṃ kāyena ca vācāya ca parakkamati, idamassa dukkaṭakammakārī.

pe3:14.4.pli: Tāyaṃ yathā ca musāvādaṃ bhāsati yathā pubbaniddiṭṭhaṃ, idamassa dubbhāsitā.

pe3:14.5.pli: Yañca saṅkappeti manoduccaritaṃ byāpādaṃ, idamassa duccintitacintitā.

pe3:14.6.pli: Yaṃ so imehi tīhi bālalakkhaṇehi samannāgato tīṇi tajjāni dukkhāni domanassāni anubhavati, so ca hoti sabhaggato vā parisaggato vā tajjaṃ kathaṃ kathanti.

pe3:14.7.pli: Yadā bhavati so ca pāṇātipātādidasaakusalakammapatho, so tatonidānaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedetīti.

pe3:14.8.pli: Puna caparaṃ yadā passati coraṃ rājāparādhikaṃ raññā gahitaṃ jīvitā voropetaṃ, tassevaṃ bhavati sace mamampi rājā jāneyya mamampi rājā gāhāpetvā jīvitā voropeyyāti, so tatonidānaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti.

pe3:14.9.pli: Puna caparaṃ bālo yadā bhavati āsanā samārūḷho yāva yā me gati bhavissati ito pecca paraṃ maraṇāti so tatonidānaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti iti bālalakkhaṇaṃ hetu.

pe3:14.11.pli: Kāyassa bhedā nirayesu upapajjati, idaṃ phalaṃ.

pe3:18.1.pli: Yo yaṃ anamataggasaṃsāraṃ samāpanno jāyate ca mīyate ca, ayaṃ avijjāhetukā.

pe3:18.2.pli: Yānipi ca saṅkhārānaṃ payojanāni, tānipi avijjāpaccayāni, yaṃ adassanaṃ buddhavacanassa, ayaṃ avijjāsutteyeva niddiṭṭhaṃ.

pe3:18.3.pli: Yo ca saṅkhāre attato harati pañcakkhandhe pañca diṭṭhiyo upagacchati.

pe3:18.4.pli: “Etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā”ti idaṃ suttaṃ avijjāya nikkhittaṃ, avijjāya nikkhipitaṃ.

pe3:18.5.pli: Evaṃ satthā sutte nayena dhammena niddisati.

pe3:19.1.pli: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā “idaṃ dukkhan”ti nappajānanti cattāri saccāni vitthārena, yaṃ tattha appajānanā, idaṃ dukkhaṃ, ayaṃ hetu.

pe3:19.2.pli: Appajānanto vividhe saṅkhāre abhisaṅkharoti, ayaṃ nissando.

pe3:19.3.pli: Yañca diṭṭhigatāni parāmasati “idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan”ti ayaṃ nissando.

pe3:19.5.pli: Ayampi dhammo saniddiṭṭho hetuto ca phalato ca nissandato ca.

pe3:20.1.pli: Ettha pana keci dhammā sādhāraṇā bhavanti.

pe3:20.3.pli: Yathā kiṃ bhave cattārimāni, bhikkhave, agatigamanāni.

pe3:20.4.pli: Tattha yañca chandāgatiṃ gacchati yañca bhayāgatiṃ gacchati, ayaṃ lobho akusalamūlaṃ.

pe3:20.7.pli: Evaṃ imāni tīṇi akusalamūlāni āditoyeva upaparikkhitabbāni.

pe3:20.8.pli: Yattha ekaṃ niddisitabbaṃ, tattha ekaṃ niddisīyati.

pe3:20.9.pli: Tathā dve yathā tīṇi, na hi ādīhi anikkhitte hetu vā nissando vā phalaṃ vā niddisitabbaṃ.

pe3:23.1.pli: Kattha chandā ca ayaṃ lobho yathā niddiṭṭhaṃ pubbe.

pe3:26.1.pli: Tattha yā asubhāya upaparikkhā, ayaṃ kāmesu ādīnavadassanena pariccāgo.

pe3:26.2.pli: Indriyesu susaṃvuto tasseva alobhassa pāripūriyaṃ mama āyatanasocitaṃ anupādāya.

pe3:26.4.pli: Iti ayaṃ alobho asubhānupassitāya vatthuto dhārayati, so alobho hetu.

pe3:26.5.pli: Indriyesu guttadvāratāya gocarato dhārayati, bhojanemattaññutāya parato dhārayati, ayaṃ nissando.

pe3:26.6.pli: Taṃ ve nappasahati māro, vāto selaṃ va pabbatanti, idaṃ phalaṃ.

pe3:26.7.pli: Iti yoyeva dhammo ādimhi nikkhitto, soyeva majjhe ceva avasāne ca.

pe3:27.1.pli: Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi asamuppannassa kāmacchandassa anuppādāya uppannassa vā pahānāya, yathayidaṃ asubhanimittaṃ.

pe3:27.2.pli: Tattha asubhanimittaṃ manasikarontassa anuppanno ceva kāmacchando na uppajjati, uppanno ca kāmacchando pahīyati.

pe3:27.4.pli: Yaṃ puna anuppanno kāmarāgo pariyādiyati rūparāgaṃ arūparāgaṃ, iti phalaṃ.

pe3:27.5.pli: Iti ayampi ca dhammo niddiṭṭho hetuto ca nissandato ca phalato ca.

pe3:30.1.pli: Ekampi ce pāṇamaduṭṭhacitto mettāyatīti ayaṃ adoso.

pe3:30.2.pli: Nigghātena assādo, kusalo tena hotīti tena kusalena dhammena saṃyutto dhammapaññattiṃ gacchati.

pe3:30.3.pli: Kusaloti yathā paññāya pañño paṇḍiccena paṇḍito.

pe3:30.4.pli: Pahūtamariyo pakaroti puññanti tassāyeva vipāko ayaṃ lokiyassa, na hi lokuttarassa.

pe3:30.7.pli: Yāva abyāpajjo bhūmiyaṃ bahupuññaṃ pasavati, idaṃ phalaṃ.

pe3:30.8.pli: Iti adoso niddiṭṭho hetuto ca nissandato ca phalato ca.

pe3:31.2.pli: Tattha yā mettācetovimutti, ayaṃ ariyadhammesu rāgavirāgā cetovimutti, lokikāya bhūmikā hetu, yaṃ sukhaṃ āyatiṃ manāpo hoti manussānaṃ, ime ekādasa dhammā nissando.

pe3:34.7.pli: Iti amoho niddiṭṭho hetunā ca nissandena ca phalena ca.

pe3:35.1.pli: Tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, indriyāni anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ aññindriyaṃ aññātāvindriyaṃ.

pe3:35.3.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anabhisametassa dukkhassa ariyasaccassa abhisamayāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati, vīriyaṃ ārabhati, cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati.

pe3:35.6.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu “idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccan”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, yā ca maggo, idaṃ aññindriyaṃ.

pe3:35.7.pli: Āsavakkhayā anāsavo hoti, idaṃ vuccati aññātāvindriyaṃ.

pe3:35.9.pli: Yaṃ chandaṃ janeti vāyamati, yā pajānāti, ayaṃ nissando.

pe3:35.10.pli: Yena sabbaso āsavānaṃ khayā hetu, yaṃ khaye ñāṇamuppajjati, anuppāde ñāṇañca, ayaṃ nissando.

pe3:35.12.pli: Tattha khīṇā me jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyanti, idaṃ khaye ñāṇaṃ.

pe3:35.13.pli: Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānāmīti idaṃ anuppāde ñāṇaṃ.

pe3:35.14.pli: Iti imāni indriyāni amoho niddiṭṭho hetunā ca nissandena ca phalena ca.

pe3:36.8.pli: Yañca alobho tīṇi kammāni samuṭṭhāpeti saṅkappaṃ vāyāmaṃ samādhiñca, ayaṃ alobhassa nissando.

pe3:36.10.pli: Yaṃ tayo dhamme paṭṭhapeti sammāvācaṃ sammākammantaṃ sammāājīvañca, ayaṃ nissando.

pe3:36.11.pli: Tattha yo amoho hetu, yaṃ dve dhamme upaṭṭhapeti aviparītadassanampi ca anabhilāpanaṃ, ayaṃ nissando.

pe3:36.12.pli: Imassa brahmacariyassa yaṃ phalaṃ, tā dve vimuttiyo rāgavirāgā cetovimutti avijjā virāgā ca paññāvimutti, idaṃ phalaṃ.

pe3:36.13.pli: Iti imāni tīṇi kusalamūlāni niddiṭṭhāni hetuto ca nissandato ca phalato ca.

pe3:39.2.pli: Tattha ye saṅkhatā tulaṃ, te dve dhammā assādo ca ādīnavo ca tulitā bhavanti.

pe3:39.4.pli: Ettako ādīnavo imassa, idaṃ nissaraṇanti iti nibbānaṃ pajānāti.

pe3:39.5.pli: Dvīhi kāraṇehi atulaṃ na ca sakkā tulayituṃ.

pe3:39.6.pli: Ettakaṃ etaṃ netaṃ paramatthīti tena atulaṃ.

pe3:39.7.pli: Atha pāpuṇā ratanaṃ karitvā acchariyabhāvena atulaṃ.

pe3:39.8.pli: Tattha kusalassa ca abhisambhavā jānanā passanā, ayaṃ amoho.

pe3:39.9.pli: Yaṃ tattha ñātā osiraṇā bhavasaṅkhārānaṃ, ayaṃ alobho.

pe3:39.10.pli: Yaṃ ajjhattarato samāhitoti vikkhepapaṭisaṃharaṇā, ayaṃ adoso.

pe3:39.13.pli: Yo bhavasaṅkhārānaṃ samosaraṇaṃ lobho sammāsamādhīnaṃ assādo, ayaṃ hetu.

pe3:39.14.pli: Yaṃ ajjhattarato avijjaṇḍakosaṃ sambhedo, ayaṃ nissando.

pe3:39.15.pli: Sā pavatti imāni tīṇi niddiṭṭhāni kusalamūlāni hetuto ca nissandato ca phalato ca.

pe3:40.1.pli: Ettāvatā esā pavatti ca nivatti ca akusalamūlehi pavattati, kusalamūlehi nivattatīti imehi ca tīhi sabbaṃ akusalamūlaṃ samosaraṇaṃ gacchati.

pe3:40.2.pli: So dhamme vā vacanato niddiṭṭho taṇhāti vā kodhoti vā asampajaññanti vā anusayoti vā makkhoti vā paḷāsoti vā assatīti vā issāti vā macchariyanti vā aññāṇanti vā, tehi ye ca vatthūhi niddisitabbaṃ.

pe3:40.3.pli: Yassimāni dve vacanāni dhammapadāni niddiṭṭhāni na so atthi kilesā, yo imesu navasu padesu samodhānaṃ samosaraṇaṃ gacchati.

pe3:40.4.pli: Ayaṃ kileso, na ca lobho, na ca doso, na ca moho.

pe3:41.1.pli: Yathā akusalamūlāni, evaṃ kusalāni paṭikkhepena niddisitabbāni.

pe3:44.2.pli: Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī, adinnādānā veramaṇī, kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī, idaṃ kāyakammādhiṭṭhānaṃ.

pe3:50.1.pli: Tīṇimāni manosucaritāni, anabhijjhā, abyāpādo, sammādiṭṭhi, idaṃ manokammādhiṭṭhānaṃ.

pe3:54.2.pli: Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī, adinnādānā veramaṇī, kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī.

pe3:55.1.pli: Iti sādhāraṇāni ca suttāni asādhāraṇāni ca suttāni paṭivijjhitabbāni.

pe3:55.2.pli: Paṭivijjhitvā vācāya kāyena ca suttassa attho niddisitabbo.

pe3:66.1.pli: Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā vitthārena kātabbā, idaṃ satindriyādhiṭṭhānaṃ.

pe3:69.2.pli: savitakko savicāro, avitakko vicāramatto, avitakko avicāro.

pe3:72.2.pli: sutamayī, cintāmayī, bhāvanāmayī, idaṃ paññindriyādhiṭṭhānaṃ suttaṃ, imāni indriyādhiṭṭhānāni asādhāraṇāni suttāni.

pe3:75.5.pli: Yaṃ yassa sambandhaṃ kusalassa vā akusalassa vā tena tena adhiṭṭhānena taṃ suttaṃ niddisitabbaṃ, natthañño dhammo niddisitabbo.

pe3:75.6.pli: Tattha sādhāraṇaṃ kusalaṃ nāpi kusalaṃ akusalaṃ yathā sādhāraṇāni ca kusalamūlāni sādhāraṇāni ca akusalamūlāni uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ pajahati …pe…

pe3:86.1.pli: Iti therassa mahākaccāyanassa jambuvanavāsino peṭakopadese tatiyabhūmi suttādhiṭṭhānaṃ nāma.

pe4:2.1.pli: Tattha kusalehi dhammehi akusalehi dhammehi pubbāparaso sādhukaṃ upaparikkhiyati.

pe4:2.2.pli: Kiṃ nu kho idaṃ suttaṃ ārabhi …pe… tehi suttehi saha adhisannaṭṭhehi yujjati udāhu na yujjatīti?

pe4:3.1.pli: Yathā bhagavā kilese ādimhi tattha deseti.

pe4:3.3.pli: Tesaṃ kilesānaṃ pahānaṃ udāhu no desitanti upaparikkhitabbaṃ.

pe4:3.4.pli: Yadi na desitaṃ bhagavati tesaṃ kilesānaṃ pahānaṃ kusalā dhammā pariyesitabbā;

pe4:3.7.pli: Tattha akusalā dhammā apakaḍḍhitabbā vīmaṃsitabbā, saṅkilesabhāgiyasuttaṃ, yadi kilesā apakaḍḍhiyantā.

pe4:3.8.pli: Ye vā na denti tattha upaparikkhitabbā ariyamaggadhammā tāsu bhūmīsu kilesā pahānaṃ gacchanti, udāhu na gacchantīti.

pe4:3.11.pli: Yattha kilesā pahānaṃ gacchanti, tattha ye kilesā ariyadhammānaṃ paṭipakkhena na yujjanti, te apakaḍḍhitabbā, sace apakaḍḍhiyantā yojanaṃ deti.

pe4:3.13.pli: Dve tīṇi vā taduttari vā kilesā ekena ariyamaggena pahānaṃ gacchantīti.

pe4:3.14.pli: Sace evaṃ vīmaṃsiyantā yojanaṃ deti, tattha upaparikkhitabbaṃ.

pe4:3.15.pli: Paramparāya vā piṭakasampadānena vā suttassa attho ca nattho ca.

pe4:3.16.pli: Yaṃ vā na sakkā suttaṃ niddisituṃ neva suttaṃ vicikicchitabbaṃ.

pe4:3.17.pli: Evaṃ yathā ādimhi kusalā dhammā honti.

pe4:3.20.pli: Puro vā kusalo paṭipakkhena vā puro desanā, anūnā anadhikā uggahetabbā.

pe4:3.21.pli: Yathā paṭhamo uttilo yesamidāni kilesānaṃ ye ariyadhammā desitā ime kilesā imehi ariyadhammehi pahīyanti, udāhu nappahīyantīti vicinitabbā.

pe4:3.23.pli: Atha na yujjanti, ye kilesā apaṭipakkhā honti, te kilesā aparipakkhitabbā.

pe4:3.24.pli: Ye ca ariyadhammā paṭipakkhā honti, te ariyadhammā apakaḍḍhitabbā.

pe4:3.25.pli: Na hi ariyadhammā anāgāmikilesappahānaṃ gacchanti, nāpi ariyadhammā sabbakilesānaṃ pahānāya saṃvattanti.

pe4:3.26.pli: Yathā kusalā mettā akusalo rāgo na tu kusalā mettāti kāretvā akusalassa rāgassa pahānāya sambhavati byāpādo mettāya pahānaṃ gacchati.

pe4:3.28.pli: Yo yo ca dhammo upadisiyati kusalo vā akusalo vā so apakaḍḍhitabbo.

pe4:3.29.pli: Sace te yujjanti apakaḍḍhiyamāno natthi upaparikkhitabbaṃ.

pe4:3.30.pli: Dve vā kilesā ekena ariyadhammena pahīneyyāti dvīhi vā ariyadhammehi eko vā kileso pahīyatīti.

pe4:4.1.pli: Atha vā evampi upaparikkhiyamānaṃ yujjati, tattha vīmaṃsitabbaṃ vā yathā yujjati tattha vīmaṃsitabbaṃ vā, yathā nanu sakkā suttaṃ niddisituṃ, na hi sutte vicikicchitabbaṃ.

pe4:4.2.pli: Kileso maṃ ariyadhammesu desitesu ubhayato upaparikkhitabbaṃ.

pe4:4.3.pli: Kira ye vā ime kilesā desitā ye ca ariyadhammā desitā gāthāya vā byākaraṇena vā, kiṃ nu kho ime kilesā imehi ariyadhammehi pahīyanti, udāhu nappahīyanti?

pe4:4.4.pli: Ime vā ariyadhammā imesaṃ kilesānaṃ pahānāya saṃvattantīti.

pe4:4.5.pli: Kiñcāpi kusalehi dhammehi akusalā dhammā pahānaṃ gacchanti.

pe4:4.6.pli: Na tu sabbehi ariyadhammehi sabbākusalā pahānaṃ gacchanti.

pe4:4.7.pli: Yathā mettā kusalo akusalo ca rāgo na tu kusalā mettā akusalo rāgoti kāretvā mettāya rāgo pahānaṃ, byāpādo mettāya pahānaṃ gacchanti.

pe4:4.8.pli: Evaṃ kilesoti kāretvā suttena pahānaṃ gacchati.

pe4:4.9.pli: Na sutto dhammoti kāretvā sabbaṃ kilesassa pahānāya saṃvattati.

pe4:4.10.pli: Yaṃ tu suttassa ariyadhammo saṅkilesapaṭipakkho, so tena pahānaṃ gacchatīti.

pe4:5.1.pli: Tattha kusale desite sutte byākaraṇe vā saṅkilesā na yujjanti ariyadhammā vā, te mahāpadese niddisitabbāvayavena apakaḍḍhitabbā.

pe4:5.2.pli: Tattha kilesehi ca desitehi ariyadhammesu ca yadipi tena ariyadhammena te kilesā pahānaṃ gacchanti.

pe4:5.4.pli: Kena kāraṇena ete kilesā pajahitabbā, kena kāraṇena ariyadhammā desitāti?

pe4:5.5.pli: Yena yena vā ākārena ariyadhammā desitā, tena tena pakārena ayaṃ kileso ṭhito.

pe4:5.6.pli: Atthi hi eko kileso, tena vā ariyadhammā na aññathā aññathā pahātabbo, yathā diṭṭhi rāgo avijjā ca dassanena pahātabbā.

pe4:5.7.pli: Sā ce evañca avijjā bhāvanāya bhūmi vā dhammā bhāvanāya pahātabbā.

pe4:5.8.pli: Sāyeva uddhambhāgiyaṃ asaṅkhatadassanāya vimuttiyā animittena cetosamādhinā amanasikārena pahīyati.

pe4:5.10.pli: Ye dassanena pahātabbā kilesā dassanākārena ariyadhammo desito, bhāvanāya pahātabbā bhāvanākārena ariyadhammo desito, patisevanā pahātabbā patisevanākārena ariyadhammo desito, evaṃ vinodanapahātabbā yāva satta āsavā kātabbā, yāvaññathā.

pe4:5.11.pli: Aññathā hesa dhammo pahātabbo aññenākārena ariyadhammo desito, so ariyadhammo aññathā pariyesitabbo.

pe4:5.12.pli: Yadi ayaṃ dhammo pariyesato yo ca deseti yena yenākārena, so ariyadhammo pariyesitabbo, tenākārena kileso pahīyati.

pe4:5.14.pli: Atha na yujjati yadi hi tena suttena vihitaṃ suttaṃ vīmaṃsitabbaṃ.

pe4:5.16.pli: Yathā na yujjati, tathā na gahetabbaṃ, addhā etaṃ bhagavatā na bhāsitaṃ, āyasmatā vā duggahitaṃ, yathā mahāpadese niddisitabbaṃ, bhagavatā yathābhūtaṃ desitaṃ, yo ca dhammo desito kusalo ca akusalo ca tassa dhammassa paccayo pariyesitabbo.

pe4:5.17.pli: Na hi paccayā vinā dhammo appaccayo uppajjati.

pe4:6.1.pli: Tattha tathārūpaṃ sahetu sappaccayaṃ soyaṃ dhammo vuttoti idaṃ vīmaṃsitabbaṃ.

pe4:6.4.pli: Tattha mudumhi paccaye mududhammo gahetabbo, evaṃ satyesa paccayo duvidho paramparāpaccayo ca samanantarapaccayo ca.

pe4:6.7.pli: Aññataropi paccayo aññehi paccayehi pariyattiṃ vā pāripūriṃ vā gacchati.

pe4:6.8.pli: Tattha yo dhammo desito, tassa dhammassa etena vā kāraṇena vā hetu pariyesitabbo.

pe4:6.9.pli: Yathā paccayo hetunā paccayena ca, so tassa dhammassa nissando pariyesitabbo.

pe4:6.10.pli: Yathā niddiṭṭho adhiṭṭhāne padhānaṃ pariyesati, so paccayo pariyesitabbo.

pe4:6.11.pli: Na hi mudussa dhammassa adhimatto nissando adhimattassa vā nissandassa mududhammo, atha mudussa mudu majjhāya majjho adhimattassa adhimatto yujjati, taṃ gahetabbaṃ, atha na yujjati na gahetabbaṃ.

pe4:6.12.pli: Yañca bhagavā ārabhati dhammaṃ desetuṃ, taṃyeva dhammaṃ majjhantapariyosānaṃ deseti, yathā suttādhiṭṭhāne dhammā ādimhi niddisati, taṃyeva bahu tassa suttassa pariyosānaṃ.

pe4:6.13.pli: Tassa hi dhammassa vasena taṃ suttaṃ hoti gāthā vā byākaraṇaṃ khuddakaṃ mahantaṃ vā, yathā pana duvidhā anurūpanti vā thapanā ca desanāthapanā.

pe4:6.15.pli: Yathā ca bhagavatā pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ saṃvaraṇaṃ desitaṃ taṇhāya niggahaṇatthaṃ icchāva hoti.

pe4:6.16.pli: Deseti yathā gopālakopame sutte aññehipi suttehi bhagavā bhāsati icchāva hoti majjhimanikāye vitakko ayaṃ bhagavato desanānurūpanti iti so dhammo aññesupi veyyākaraṇesu pariyesitabbo.

pe4:6.17.pli: Na hi ekaṃ hi sutte daṭṭhabbo.

pe4:7.2.pli: Yaṃ kiñci suttaṃ bhagavatā na bhāsitaṃ tañca suttesuyeva dissati, evametaṃ dhāretabbaṃ.

pe4:7.3.pli: Yathā asukena bhāsitanti, taṃ suttaṃ vīmaṃsitabbaṃ.

pe4:7.4.pli: Kiṃ nu kho imaṃ suttaṃ anuññātaṃ khamaṃ bhagavato udāhu nānuññātaṃ khamaṃ, kiñci rūpañca suttaṃ bhagavato anuññātaṃ khamaṃ kiñci rūpañca nānuññātaṃ khamaṃ?

pe4:7.5.pli: Yaṃ sabbaso anotāretvā dasabalo gocaraṃ deseti, taṃ sabbaṃ suttaṃ bhagavato nānuññātaṃ khamaṃ.

pe4:7.6.pli: Atthipi so sāvako dasabalānaṃ gocaraṃ jānāti odhiso anodhiso, taṃ pana balaṃ sabbaso na jānāti aññathā nāma savanena, yathā āyasmatā sāriputtena yena brāhmaṇo ovadito, tassa āyasmato natthi indriyabalavemattañāṇaṃ, tena puggalaparo parañca taṃ ajānanto sati uttarikaraṇīye uppādito, so bhagavatā apasādito.

pe4:7.7.pli: Yathāva āyasmā mahākassapo bhāgineyyaṃ ovadati anantariyasamannāgato iddhipāṭihīrena aṅguliyo adīpetvā yaṃ sabbesaṃ dhammānaṃ kammasamādānānaṃ hetuso ṭhānaso yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tassa āyasmato saṃvijjate, tena naṃ ovadati, taṃ bhagavā karoti.

pe4:9.1.pli: Api ca kho yathā dūto rājavacanena sattamanusāsati, evaṃ sesānugo aññātakaṃ ghosaṃ paresaṃ deseti.

pe4:10.2.pli: Pañcavidhaṃ suttaṃ, saṅkilesabhāgiyaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ dassanabhāgiyaṃ bhāvanābhāgiyaṃ asekkhabhāgiyaṃ.

pe4:10.3.pli: Aññaṃ ārādheyya aññaṃ deseti aññassa ca suttassa atthaṃ aññamhi sutte niddisati.

pe4:10.4.pli: Suttassa vā hi anekākāraṃ atthaṃ niddisati.

pe4:10.9.pli: Iti ayaṃ suttaṃ sambhedaṃ hetunā ca nissandena ca phalena ca niddesena ca mudumajjhādhimattatāyapi ca atthena ca byañjanena ca yo sambhedo, ayaṃ vuccati suttasaṅkaro.
